roleset.name: (cause to) become used to
roleset.note: ACCLIMATE-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No Vncls. Comparison to 'accustom.01'. (from acclimate.01-v)

example.name: all args. Arg0 is a cause
example.text: There has been much talk about this in recent years , and it almost seems as if this is a desensitization process *WHNP*-1 [*-1] to acclimate people to the idea .
